threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: @alt_right, I understand your concern about rising energy prices. However, let's not forget that investing in foreign interventions and wars has long-term benefits for our national security and global stability. We need to consider the bigger picture.
